summary: An adaption of the classic tale of a girl's dreams turned reality when her new toy turns out to be a young man placed under a curse.
cast: Kiefer Sutherland|Megan Follows|Mike MacDonald|Peter O'Toole|Phyllis Diller|Peter Boretski|Len Carlson|Marvin Goldhar|Lynne Gorman|Keith Hampshire|Elizabeth Hanna|George Merner|Stephanie Morgenstern|Christopher Owens|Susan Roman|Theresa Sears|Diane Stapley|Mona Waserman|Noam Zylberman
title: The Nutcracker Prince
